promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple hawk electric-type pokemon with a white tail. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or hawk. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thunderaptor, a a gigantic simple hawk electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Electric Punch, Balloon Barrage. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "hawk", "electric" or "Thunderaptor". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, hawk-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: Roaming storm-ridden skies, this massive avian excels in dynamic tempests. It blasts foes with lightning punches and balloon bombs.
